meanings.definition: To surpass in skill or achievement.
meanings.sent1: She outrivals her classmates in math.
meanings.sent2: The new student quickly outrivals the old ones in basketball.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outrivals the other animals in nut gathering.
meanings.sent4: His dedication outrivals all others in the competition.
meanings.sent5: Her talent outrivals everyone else on the team.

meanings.definition: To be better than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The sun outrivals the moon in brightness.
meanings.sent2: His performance outrivals hers in the play.
meanings.sent3: The cat outrivals the dog in napping skills.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outrivals his in generosity.
meanings.sent5: The mountain outrivals the hills in height.
